languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс хмыкает.{/n} "Я предоставил господину Калькасару полный отчет о пребывании в твоей свите с массой... интересных подробностей. К нему я также приложил прошение вернуться в распоряжение Лорд-инквизитора, которое он незамедлительно одобрил. Но не волнуйся, недреманное око Инквизиции не перестанет следить за каждым твоим шагом".

{n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "I submitted a comprehensive report on my time in your retinue to Lord Calcazar. It contained a wealth of... interesting details. I supplemented it with a formal request to return to the Lord Inquisitor's side, which he immediately approved. But don't worry. The unsleeping eye of the Inquisition will continue to watch your every step."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс хмыкает.{/n} "Я предоставил господину Калькасару полный отчет о пребывании в твоей свите с массой... интересных подробностей. К нему я также приложил прошение вернуться в распоряжение Лорд-инквизитора, которое он незамедлительно одобрил. Но не волнуйся, недреманное око Инквизиции не перестанет следить за каждым твоим шагом".

I supplemented it with a formal request to return under the Lord Inquisitor's command, which he immediately approved. But don't worry. The unsleeping eye of the Inquisition will continue to watch your every step."

languages.text: {n}海因里希清了清嗓子。{/n}“我向卡尔卡扎大人提交了一份报告，关于我在你麾下的所有事情，其中包含了大量……有趣的细节。我还在报告中补充了一份正式请求书，希望能回到大审判官大人的麾下，他立刻批准了我的请求。不过别担心，审判庭的无眠之眼会继续关注你接下来的一举一动。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "I submitted a comprehensive report on my time in your retinue to Lord Calcazar. It contained a wealth of... interesting details. I supplemented it with a formal request to return to the Lord Inquisitor's side, which he immediately approved. But don't worry. The unsleeping eye of the Inquisition will continue to watch your every step."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希哼了一声。{/n}“我向卡尔卡扎大人提交了一份报告，关于我在你麾下的所有事情，其中包含了大量……有趣的细节。我还在报告中补充了一份正式请求书，希望能回到审判长大人的麾下，他立刻批准了我的请求。不过别担心，审判庭的无眠之眼会继续关注你接下来的一举一动。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは咳払いをする。{/n}「カルカサル様には、陛下の従者だった時の詳細にわたる報告書を提出しました。報告書には沢山の…興味深い事が書かれています。ロード・インクィジター側に戻ることを正式に要請し、すぐに承認されましたよ。でも、心配はご無用。異端審問庁の眠らぬ目は、いつでも御身の行動一つ一つを、監視し続けるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "I submitted a comprehensive report on my time in your retinue to Lord Calcazar. It contained a wealth of... interesting details. I supplemented it with a formal request to return to the Lord Inquisitor's side, which he immediately approved. But don't worry. The unsleeping eye of the Inquisition will continue to watch your every step."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは咳払いをする。{/n}「カルカサル様には、陛下の従者だった時の詳細にわたる報告書を提出しました。報告書には沢山の…興味深い事が書かれています。ロード・インクィジター側に戻ることを正式に要請し、すぐに承認されましたよ。でも、心配はご無用。異端審問庁の眠らぬ目は、いつでも御身の行動一つ一つを、監視し続けるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix carraspea.{/n} «Presenté a Lord Calcazar un informe exhaustivo sobre el tiempo que pasé en su séquito. Contenía una gran cantidad de... detalles interesantes. Lo completé con una petición formal de volver a estar junto al Lord Inquisidor, petición que él aprobó inmediatamente; pero no se preocupe, el ojo de la Inquisición no descansa y seguirá vigilando cada uno de sus pasos».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "I submitted a comprehensive report on my time in your retinue to Lord Calcazar. It contained a wealth of... interesting details. I supplemented it with a formal request to return to the Lord Inquisitor's side, which he immediately approved. But don't worry. The unsleeping eye of the Inquisition will continue to watch your every step."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se burla.{/n} «Presenté a Lord Calcazar un informe exhaustivo sobre el tiempo que pasé en su séquito. Contenía una gran cantidad de... detalles interesantes. Lo completé con una petición formal de volver a estar bajo el mando del Lord Inquisidor, petición que él aprobó inmediatamente; pero no se preocupe, el ojo de la Inquisición no descansa y seguirá vigilando cada uno de sus pasos».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix räuspert sich.{/n} "Ich habe Lord Calcazar einen umfassenden Bericht über meine Zeit in Eurem Gefolge zukommen lassen. Er enthielt eine Vielzahl an ... interessanten Details. Ich habe zudem einen förmlichen Antrag angeheftet, wieder an die Seite des Großinquisitors versetzt zu werden, welchen er augenblicklich bewilligt hat. Doch seid unbesorgt. Das stets wache Auge der Inquisition wird weiterhin jeden Eurer Schritte beobachten."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "I submitted a comprehensive report on my time in your retinue to Lord Calcazar. It contained a wealth of... interesting details. I supplemented it with a formal request to return to the Lord Inquisitor's side, which he immediately approved. But don't worry. The unsleeping eye of the Inquisition will continue to watch your every step."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hüstelt.{/n} "Ich habe Lord Calcazar einen umfassenden Bericht über meine Zeit in Eurem Gefolge zukommen lassen. Er enthielt eine Vielzahl an ... interessanten Details. Ich habe zudem einen förmlichen Antrag angeheftet, wieder unter den Befehl des Großinquisitors versetzt zu werden, welchen er augenblicklich bewilligt hat. Doch seid unbesorgt. Das stets wache Auge der Inquisition wird weiterhin jeden Eurer Schritte beobachten."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix s'éclaircit la gorge.{/n} « J'ai envoyé un rapport complet au seigneur Calcazar sur mon expérience dans votre entourage. Je n'ai pas omis d'y inclure un certain nombre de détails... intéressants, et j'y ai ajouté une demande officielle d'affectation auprès du seigneur inquisiteur, demande qu'il a immédiatement approuvée. Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, l'œil vigilant de l'Inquisition continuera à surveiller le moindre de vos faits et gestes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "I submitted a comprehensive report on my time in your retinue to Lord Calcazar. It contained a wealth of... interesting details. I supplemented it with a formal request to return to the Lord Inquisitor's side, which he immediately approved. But don't worry. The unsleeping eye of the Inquisition will continue to watch your every step."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix s'éclaircit la gorge.{/n} « J'ai envoyé un rapport complet au seigneur Calcazar sur mon expérience dans votre entourage. Je n'ai pas omis d'y inclure un certain nombre de détails... intéressants, et j'y ai ajouté une demande officielle d'affectation aux ordres du seigneur inquisiteur, demande qu'il a immédiatement approuvée. Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, l'œil vigilant de l'Inquisition continuera à surveiller le moindre de vos faits et gestes. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Lord Calcazar'a, maiyetinde geçirdiğim süreye ilişkin teferruatlı bir rapor ilettim. Bu raporda oldukça... Geniş çaplı bilgiler sundum. Rapora, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun yanına dönme talebimi belirten resmî bir talep de ekledim. Kendisi de bunu derhâl kabul etti. Ama endişelenmene lüzum yok. Engizisyon'un uyku bilmez gözleri, yine her adımını izleyecektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "I submitted a comprehensive report on my time in your retinue to Lord Calcazar. It contained a wealth of... interesting details. I supplemented it with a formal request to return to the Lord Inquisitor's side, which he immediately approved. But don't worry. The unsleeping eye of the Inquisition will continue to watch your every step."
